thread.title: InventHelp Client's Device Allows For Safer Use of Cell Phones (DLL-2868)
thread.title_full: InventHelp Client's Device Allows For Safer Use of Cell Phones (DLL-2868)

author: Chrissa Chverchko
title: InventHelp Client's Device Allows For Safer Use of Cell Phones (DLL-2868)
text:
Cell phones have become ubiquitous, which makes them more vulnerable to damage, especially while users are out and about "I needed a way to stop dropping and damaging my cell phone," said an inventor from Mesquite, Texas, "so I decided to pursue the idea myself." The CELL SAVER enables a person to use a cell phone more safely and conveniently. This prevents the phone from being dropped, which avoids damage. It also eliminates the need or temptation to search for the phone while driving, which can prevent accidents and save lives. Easy to use and compact, it's compatible with all cell phones.
The original design was submitted to the Dallas office of InventHelp. It is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers. For more information, write Dept. 14-DLL-2868, InventHelp, 217 Ninth Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15222, or call (412) 288-1300 ext. 1368. Learn more about InventHelp's Invention Submission Services at http://www.InventHelp.com - https://www.youtube.com/user/inventhelp
